Token.Abstract: The AlfrescoSiteService provides various ways to retrieve sites from an Alfresco repository.
Initialises with a standard Cloud or OnPremise session

Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: the AlfrescoSession to initialise the site service with.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all the sites in the repository.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved sites in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves sites in the repository with listing context.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: The listing context with a paging definition that's used to retrieve the nodes.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved sites in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all the sites for the current user of the session.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved sites in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the sites for the current session user with listing context.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: The listing context with a paging definition that's used to retrieve the nodes.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved sites in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all the favorite sites for the current session user.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved sites in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the favorite sites for the current session user with listing context.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: The listing context with a paging definition that's used to retrieve the nodes.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved sites in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves a site with the given short name, if the site doesnâ€™t exist nil is returned.

Parameter.Name: siteShortName
Parameter.Abstract: The short name of the site that needs to be retrieved.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved site in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the folder that represents the root of the Document Library for the site with the given short name.

Parameter.Name: siteShortName
Parameter.Abstract: The short name of the site for which the document library needs to be retrieved.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved document library folder in case the operation succeeds.
